summary: Set up backend support for gift card rate lookup by creating a `gift_card_rates` database table used to fetch rate by brand and card value.
architectural_notes: Add a `gift_card_rates` table to persist per-brand gift card rates; fields discussed: id, brand_name, rate_percentage, status (active/inactive).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create `gift_card_rates` database table (id, brand_name, rate_percentage, status active/inactive) to support gift card rate lookup
Implement backend storage for a gift card rates table named `gift_card_rates` with fields: `id`, `brand_name`, `rate_percentage`, and `status` (active/inactive).
Expose backend methods for admins to create, update, and deactivate/reactivate entries in `gift_card_rates`, and expose query methods to list rates and fetch the active rate for a given `brand_name`.

projectName: Add backend support for gift_card_rates (brand rates with active/inactive status)
